headline.print_headline: Teacher Out at Fordham Prep After School Says ’84 Abuse Claim Is Credible
headline.main: Teacher Out at Fordham Prep After School Says ’84 Sexual Abuse Claim Is Credible

snippet: A former student, Michael Meenan, said he told the Bronx school’s headmaster about the episode not long after it happened. A repeated complaint this year produced action....
abstract: Former Fordham Prep student Michael Meenan says he reported being sexually abused by religious studies teacher Fernand Beck in 1984 shortly after incident, but no action was ever taken; Fordham Prep has recently acknowledged Meenan's account of abuse as credible and says Beck will not return to school; Meenan's lawyer is asking school to compensate Meenan for pain and suffering, although it is too late to file lawsuit.
